entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny early this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 13 this morning and minus 6 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Flurries. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h late this evening then light after midnight. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023
